page.syntax: IsUserInRole as L (UserName as C, RoleName as C)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type. .T. if user is in the role; otherwise .F.

page.description: Checks to see if the user is in a role.
page.discussion: Context.Security.IsUserInRole() checks to see if the user is in a role. Check Context.Security.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
